page.title: 02 WOODROFFE SQUARE - CALNE
page.content: I live in Woodroffe Square in Calne. Opposite me some private builders have just finished 6 new houses. Straight up Prince Charles Drive they have built a new bit to the estate it's called Grosvenor Park. My friend lives there. Before the six new houses were built I helped the two bricklayers carry bricks. I like helping builders with bricks and other jobs because it is fun. Sometimes a man came with a JVC digger and dug trenches. He gave me rides in the bucket of his digger. He told me he worked on a golf course.He found lots of golf balls, he gave me some. Years ago the school caretaker's house was a pond and my row of houses was a field.They are building lots of new houses in Calne. I live by the school and there is a park not far away. My house is eleven years old.
